src_original: varjeti akṣaṇāṃ aṣṭau ye kecid deśitā mayā /
kṣatriyamahāśālaś ca āḍhyo bhoti mahādhano //  rājā pi dhārmiko bhoti jaṃbūdvīpasmiṃ īśvaro /  praśāsati imāṃ ca sarvāṃ medinīṃ girikuṇḍalāṃ //
[_Mvu_2.364_] rājye pratiṣṭhito buddhaṃ satkaroti punar punaḥ //
cyutaś ca gacchate svargaṃ prasanno buddhaśāsane /
śakro pi bhoti devendro merumūrdhani īśvaro //  suyāmo bhoti devendro bhoti saṃtuṣito pi ca /  nirmito pi ca devendro vaśavartī ca īśvaraḥ //  brahmā pi brahmalokasmiṃ īśvaro bhoti paṇḍito /
na jātu andho kāṇo vā bhoti kalpāna koṭibhiḥ /
dṛḍhavīryo dṛḍhasthāmo dhaureyo dṛḍhavikramo /  kauśalyaṃ gacchate kṣipraṃ stūpaṃ kṛtvā pradakṣiṇaṃ //
itaś cyavitvā mṛto hi trāyastriṃśāṃ sa gacchati /
aṣṭāṃgavarasaṃpūrṇāṃ suvarṇavālukasaṃstṛtāṃ /  vaiḍūryasphāṭikāstīrṇāṃ divyāṃ puṣkariṇīṃ labhe //
bhuṃjitvā vibhavāṃ divyāṃ paripūretva paṇḍito /  cyavitvā devalokāto manuṣyo bhoti bhogavāṃ //
satkṛto bhoti sarvatra mālāṃ dattvāna cetiye //
cakravartī api rājā śakro pi bhoti īśvaraḥ /
brahmā pi brahmalokasmiṃ mālāṃ dattvāna cetiye //
[_Mvu_2.366_] sarve sya arthā vartanti ye divyā ye ca mānuṣāḥ //
tasyāpi bhoti śubha ātmabhāvo  dvātriṃśatīhi sphuṭa lakṣaṇehi /
yehi sya nityaṃ pratapati ātmabhāvaḥ  yūpo viśiṣṭo yatha kāṃcanasya /  jāmbūnadasya yatha darśanīyo  asaṃprakīrṇo sphuṭo vyaṃjanehi //
na dhyānahānir bhavate kadācit*  na bodhicittaṃ jahate kadācit* /
vādetva vādyaṃ jinacetiyeṣu //  jihvāsya bhoti tanudarśanīyā
na jātu gilāno bhave pāṇḍurāgo  na cāpi kuṣṭhī nāpi ca kilāsī /
naiṣkramyato bhavati adīnacitto  choretva jālaṃ jinacetiyeṣu //  so akṣaṇāni parivarjayitvā
choretva jālaṃ jinacetiyeṣu //  daurvarṇiyaṃ ca jahe sarvakālaṃ
vastrāṃ viśiṣṭāṃ labhe suvarṇacitrāṃ /  raṅgopapetāṃ suruciradarśanīyāṃ
choretva jālaṃ jinacetiyeṣu //  abhyuddharitvāna jinacetiyeṣu  nirmālyaṃ tuṣṭo pramudito vegajāto /
abhyuddhareyā jinacetiyeṣu  osire puṣpa purimaṃ milānaṃ //
śokaṃ ca doṣaṃ ca jahe sarvakālaṃ
prāsādiko sumano tejavanto //  tasyaiva rājño praṇamati sarvaloko
sarvāṃ sahasrāṃ kusumitalokadhātuṃ  prāśāsi vīro tato īśvaratve //
parivāras tasya bhavati abhedyo  [_Mvu_2.395_] puṇyavanto smṛtivanta prajñavanto /
yathābhiprāyaṃ janayati teṣu prītiṃ //  prapūravākyaṃ svarāṅgaṃ bhavati śuddhaṃ
